name: Cancer Care Platform for Patient Communication and Support
description: Built a comprehensive care management platform enabling cancer patients to communicate with other patients, family members, and caregivers while creating supportive communities based on cancer type, region, and demographics.
challenge: Cancer patients needed a dedicated platform to connect with others facing similar challenges while maintaining privacy and security. The platform required sophisticated networking capabilities to create meaningful connections based on medical conditions, geographic location, and personal demographics, while integrating with social media for extended support networks.
solution: Developed a comprehensive social care platform with patient networking capabilities, private group creation based on cancer type/region/gender, family and caregiver communication tools, Facebook integration for extended networks, comprehensive care management features, and secure HIPAA-compliant communication channels.
outcomes: Improved patient engagement and mental wellbeing
Enhanced medication adherence through peer support
Reduced patient isolation through community building
Better care coordination between patients and caregivers
Measurable improvement in patient mental health outcomes
teamSize: Full-stack development team with healthcare specialists
keyFeatures: Private network creation by cancer type/region/gender
Social media integration for extended support
socialImpact: Improved quality of life during treatment
